'La Rochelle' () is a city in western France and a seaport on the Bay of Biscay,
a part of the Atlantic Ocean. It is the capital of the Charente-Maritime
department.

The city is connected to the Ãle de RÃ© by a bridge completed on 19 May 1988. Its
harbour opens into a protected strait, the Pertuis d'Antioche.
categories: Port cities and towns on the French Atlantic coast
